name: nanothrower
description: Model hydrogen adsorption on the surface of nanostructures based on the “Random rain” algorithm

scripts.postinstall: copyfiles -f node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.slim.min.js vendor && terser node_modules/three/build/three.module.js -c -m -o vendor/three.min.js && lessc --clean-css="--advanced" dev/css/main.less dev/css/main.css
scripts.build: rollup -c && terser dev/js/rr-worker.js -c toplevel -m toplevel -o build/js/rr-worker.js && copyfiles -u 1 dev/css/main.css dev/index.html build

author: Amphiluke
